# setResult(string:)

**Instance Method**

Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified plaintext string from the item provider.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setResult(string: String)
```

## Setting a text paste item’s result value

- **setResult(attributedString:)**: Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified attributed string from the item provider.
- **setResult(attachment:)**: Sets a text paste item’s attachment value to a specified value.
- **setDefaultResult()**: Sets the text paste item’s value to the default value based on the item provider’s data.
- **setNoResult()**: Sets the text paste item’s textual value to not include data from the item provider.
